website_summaries.verdict: A well-made blind that is easy to use for one person.
pros: Fits one person in a chair comfortably
Tall at 78" but also wide at 60"
cons: It may be uncomfortable for shooting while in a sitting position

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Windows should come with a camo screen. I had to make my own. Product would’ve got 5 stars otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Good basic hide for photography
customer_reviews.text: Very good for wildlife photography. It's build for hunters, no openings for tripod's legs, no camo net on the windows, but it's not really a problem. In fact vertical openings may look less suspect to some birds, provided you don't move too much. It's much smaller than the Doghouse but I can sit on a portable armchair with a mid-sized tripod, less stable, stakes are needed most of the time, it's also much easier to place in the vegetation than the Doghouse with it's smaller footprint. Very happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: S.E.

customer_reviews.title: Quality ground blind
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law is an avid sportsman and hunter. I purchased this for him to use when he wanted to hunt on the ground instead of using his climbing tree stand or shooting house. He loves it. It arrived in a secure package in excellent condition. It is high quality and has held up to frequent use in all types of weather. It has enough room to sit comfortably and hunt with a gun, it is a little small inside to be able to use for bow hunting. The blind is easy to set up and take back down and pack up to treck out of the woods with ease. Would recommend this to others!
customer_reviews.author: BSK

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for as tall as this thing is
customer_reviews.text: I muddy this blind up with mud and water down gray flat paint. I put it out in the woods without brushing it in a whole lot. My husband went out there to take it down. He walked past it 3 times before finding it setting in the mist of some trees where I set it up at. Not bad for as tall as this thing is. "Muddy it up" takes off the shine on it and helps to blind it into the woods.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Pinholes
customer_reviews.text: Got this today set it up the roof full of pinholes sending it back looking for better one
customer_reviews.author: dan fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great little Blind.
customer_reviews.text: Goes up quickly, breaks down quickly (follow the directions on You Tube--way easier) and fits into its own little bag. Good visibility on 3 sides, and tall enough to stand up and stretch your legs now and then. I doubt any but the smallest shooter could use this for a bowhunting blind, but as a gunning blind, it is perfect. Looking forward to using it during our next turkey season.
customer_reviews.author: Huntryx

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used in field but looks good.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think this will work well. Simple to set up and a little more difficult to take down but easy after you learn how. Plenty of room inside for crossbow, I didn't try compound.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price! Only thing I would change is the stakes it comes with. Very skinny and not very long. I changed the stakes to make sure it would be secure in the wind..working great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great blind! I love the multiple openings and I find it large enough for my 5'9" frame to move about easily with two dogs and my camera. It's also light enough with backpack straps to make hiking in a ways to duck blinds a breeze. My husband is 6'5" and can rifle hunt out of it but not bow as there isn't enough room to draw without sticking the bow outside of the doors. Finally, I initially had a problem with my order and the company provided immediate response and eventual resolution of the problem, which prompted me to take the time to actually write this review.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa & David

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: The deer don’t even care about it walk right by you will bring home the meat
customer_reviews.author: Anthony sperry

customer_reviews.title: With this unit you can get close.Real close. Don’t know about the rain protections yet!
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a hummingbird blind and it functions as it should. Lightweight, foldable and open access for all 4 sides gives me plenty of modes for shooting.
customer_reviews.author: BJF

customer_reviews.title: Good but mine did not come with accessories
customer_reviews.text: Overall good blind. But did not come with stakes or tie downs as stated in description and on box. Would have been nice to get everything you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: TxBuck

customer_reviews.title: Great 1 person blind but know what you are buying!
customer_reviews.text: The blind is perfect for a throw it up one man blind that you can stand up in. Use the ground stakes and there is plenty of room even for a larger guy like myself. My only recommendation to Ameristep would be to include screens on the openings. When flaps are down you are fully exposed. You can work around it by being creative with the openings so it's workable. Would not suggest for bow hunters.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher King

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Blind
customer_reviews.text: The Blind arrived super fast. It was extremely easy to set up and is perfect concealment for 1 person. Anyone needing a really simple effective single person blind should give this one a try. Deer came right by me the first day I set it up.
customer_reviews.author: RDB

customer_reviews.title: This is how Amazon cares for their inventory
customer_reviews.text: The product itself seems to be okay, even though it arrived like this, inside another box, and appears to be used. I used to expect better from Amazon, but have been repeatedly disappointed by them as of late.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of little holes inside
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Inside you'll see tons of small holes. Great for wildlife photography tho
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great concealment!
customer_reviews.text: Lite to carry, easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Chalfant

customer_reviews.title: Cost
customer_reviews.text: Great cost, easy to set up but only for one person. johnl
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed. Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and durable as described. But the one I received didn’t have the replaceable shoot through mesh. Just zippered doors and windows. Rather disappointed there, but still a good blind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for XL and tall people
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 6’ 7” husband, he has been very comfortable. Super easy setup. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs too... I can’t shoot a bow comfortably from it, but no issues with a rifle. Will see how it holds up this rifle season.
customer_reviews.author: Arne S.

customer_reviews.title: Not made for big people
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big man 6'3" and 300lb not enough room for a big person. I used it for archery hunting with a compound crossbow. I bought a 2man blind after the 2nd day
customer_reviews.author: JOHN G FITZGERALD

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Used multiple times during rifle season. Kept me dry in all day rain. Quick and easy to set up and take down. Only for one person for sure. I put a folding chair and my back pack inside and was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these set up and have used them for several years. I like the way you can only open the windows as little as you would like. The blinds are tall and do not collapse in snow as others I have owned. good blind for the price.
customer_reviews.author: carol s.

customer_reviews.title: Very small inside and windows are too high up for most stools or chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Not really what I thought it was . May work for some people.
customer_reviews.author: ggod

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and functional at a great price. Stake it down. Enough room to setup my folding chair, crossbow on a shooting stick and have room to spare. Large door opening. Watch the youtube video and folding it up is a breeze. Straps on the bag could use reinforcing. Purchased this at seasons end and used it twice.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Small for even one person. Limited to no instructions. Blind does NOT have "shoot thru mesh" as described.
customer_reviews.author: D.Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Okish
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up, impossible to fold back up. Not quite big enough for me to swivel in, and windows could be higher.
customer_reviews.author: Scami

customer_reviews.title: Held up well.
customer_reviews.text: This is being bought as a replacement for one left up for three years in rain, snow, sun and finally fell apart this past season. So certainly got my monies worth out of the dog house. As advertised is for one person. Fits a ADK chair for comfy seating.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J

customer_reviews.title: Decent blind for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good blind for the price. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Debra G.

customer_reviews.title: good buy. First season to use it and I'll ...
customer_reviews.text: Kinda small for a big guy, but for the price: good buy. First season to use it and I'll be curious to see how long I can keep using it if I bring it in at the end of the season each year. Very easy to set up as it's basically spring loaded to develop that shape. Not for a bow, unless it's a small one, but crossbow will work.
customer_reviews.author: Marty K

customer_reviews.title: Deer blind
customer_reviews.text: Work great this season!.. Can only use a short barrel firearm because they are not wide enough for a long gun!....
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Malone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to set up. I just about gave up on putting it back in it's carry-case. Phew, hardest work out I've had in a while. I'm 73, maybe that's why.
customer_reviews.author: Bill T.

customer_reviews.title: Fair but not going to buy another one
customer_reviews.text: Pain to get back down and not good in little wind
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband,he loves it,goes up and comes down very easy,nice size,light weight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice product that definitely serves its purpose for the price. I could move nicely and it anchored well to the ground. It withstood a few overnights in heavy snow no problem. On the downside, there were some thin spots in the material you could see daylight through, sort of pinprick size holes. I filled them with natural beeswax and they stayed water tight. I also put wax on the zippers as they were a little loud and not air tight. With a couple of modifications, it stayed totally air tight and water proof. Good product for the money but needs a little work to make it suitable for the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Very functional. A little difficult to get It back into storage sack.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: it works great, but it would be really tight if you ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating this five stars because I'm only using it for one person. For a single person, it works great, but it would be really tight if you tried to squeeze two people in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ameristep blind
customer_reviews.text: A little cramp and I am not that big of a guy. Bought it for the price to try hunting out of the blind. Easy setup though. Wind conditions shake it around.
customer_reviews.author: dr

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Set it up and it stayed in place great good field of veiw easy to set up and take down stayed in place in 55 mph winds
customer_reviews.author: Richard Underwood

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way they worked the windows
customer_reviews.text: It's tight, but exactly what is needed in spots where a larger blind wont work. You'll have your hands full when you go to fold it up. Ameristep used to print directions on a tag inside of storage bag, I couldn't find them. Here's a very helpful video:  I really like the way they worked the windows. If you're careful, and have a short draw length, you can come to full draw with bow - but again very tight. Better suited for gun and crossbow. Camo is good, but I hid it under a cedar tree canopy. Loops for adding extra vegetation a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: T.R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have shoot through mess windows
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have shoot through mess windows , as advertised!!!!!!! You will have to add you own!!!
customer_reviews.author: Howarth

customer_reviews.title: Great for hunting and taking pictures of wild life
customer_reviews.text: It really works it's easy to set up it's worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Wade Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Great for staying dry and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Can stand up and stretch. Easy to fold and erect.
customer_reviews.author: Alto MI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and cheap. Watch the youtube video for easy peasy way to collapse and store.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Looking Forward to Spring Turkey
customer_reviews.text: Nice blind for the money. Make sure you watch YouTube for instructions to fold it back in place to put away...
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: blinds
customer_reviews.text: no problem with this. easy to assemble. good for one person only
customer_reviews.author: Jake Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and fold away
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if it had a screened window in the back to see what is coming behind you.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: but quick set-up & tear down & easy to tote out to the woods
customer_reviews.text: Very basic, but quick set-up & tear down & easy to tote out to the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great blind, held up well in rain and wind. It can be a pain to fold up but still a great blind.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian V.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Very, very nice for the price, easily folds back to fit in carrying bag
customer_reviews.author: Kobe A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love hunting from this blind, gives me freedom to move more than a tree stand.
customer_reviews.author: Marjo

customer_reviews.title: Practical for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and disassemble, but it is very susceptible to wind, will fold over in light gusts. Besides the anchors at the four corners you will need to anchor the top in some manner. We used nylon cord and stakes on all four sides to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great blind for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great blind for the money. I have 7 of these in the woods right now. Just the other day, I had a deer wiyhin 15 feet of the blind and did not know I was there.
customer_reviews.author: lee sheorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: iT WAS A GIFT He says he likes it...so there you go!
customer_reviews.author: maremare

customer_reviews.title: Good blind, but difficult to take down
customer_reviews.text: I love these little blinds and have taken many deer while sitting in them. I do, however, find it quite difficult to re-pack it and have been smacked by the metal rods on several occasions. So, instead of using it as a mobile blind, I have strategically placed 4 of these in permanent locations on my lease. They will last about 2 or 3 seasons staying in the woods, but it allows the deer to get used to the blinds and it saves the headache of repacking it since I hunt the spots so much. And the cost to replace these when they finally weather away is relatively low especially if you catch them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Blind
customer_reviews.text: So what difficult to fold And not as stable as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: tammyclark

customer_reviews.title: Nice blind
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy to put up a little more to taking it down with a little practice should get it. Nice to stand up in it as I am over 6feet tall.
customer_reviews.author: David Cibula

customer_reviews.title: Terrible blind to archery hunt out of if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible blind to archery hunt out of if you are over 5 feet 5 inches no room to draw bow and very loud zippers
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would like it better if was a little bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: Glenn M.

customer_reviews.title: A great blind
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. It will work nice to view wildlife
customer_reviews.author: mrbill

product_meta.title: Ameristep Outhouse Hunting Blind
feature_bullets: Tall enough to stand up in
Ideal for crossbow and firearm hunting
